definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
variant of 彷彿|仿佛[fang3 fu2]
to copy/to imitate/to make by imitating a model
pseudo-classical/modeled on antique/in the old style
to copy/to produce sth after a model/to counterfeit

sentences.english: Kissing sounds, howling, and smacking lips.
sentences.chinese: 接吻聲，仿狼嚎，吧噠嘴脣。

sentences.english: The last work is an installation of fingerprint stamp.
sentences.chinese: 第四件作品是仿印章的指紋裝置。

sentences.english: The Long Corridor is based on the corridor in JiangTian Temple in ZhengJiang, JiangSu Province.
sentences.chinese: 這個遊廊是仿江蘇省鎮江市“江天寺”而建的觀景廊。

sentences.english: The house was built after the Chinese style.
sentences.chinese: 那房子是仿中國式樣蓋的。

sentences.english: The tower body with iron imitated wood casting layer, layer by layer stack assembled.
sentences.chinese: 塔身用生鐵仿木構分層鑄造，逐層迭裝而成。

sentences.english: Even the cover is visually arresting-imitating the leather-covered log of a ship's captain.
sentences.chinese: 即使是視覺的封面逮捕仿皮革覆蓋日誌的船長。

sentences.english: Cover with a sheet of non-stick baking parchment.
sentences.chinese: 用一張不粘烘焙仿羊皮紙包上。

sentences.english: Tap-style pavilions for Fangmu structure Zhuanta, seven solid.
sentences.chinese: 塔爲樓閣式仿木結構磚塔，七層實心。

sentences.english: The actuator placement optimization of piezothermoelastic biotic thermal robust structure is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了熱壓電仿生熱魯棒結構致動器放置優化的問題。

sentences.english: Tusk is another epitome of Chinese ornamental design. It is the typical representative of Guangdong ivory craft skills.
sentences.chinese: 仿牙雕是中國的另一國粹，爲典型的廣東牙雕風格。

sentences.english: A new rare-earth copper alloy powder for 24K gold imitation is prepared.
sentences.chinese: 研製新型仿24K金稀土銅合金粉材料。

sentences.english: It is also Macao's only pseudo-European theater.
sentences.chinese: 也是澳門惟一一家仿歐式的劇院。

sentences.english: Baton of clay painted in red stripes, with imitation mace-head of clay.
sentences.chinese: 泥塑棍棒，表面塗有紅色條紋，頂端是仿狼牙棒頭。

sentences.english: Finding a way to dye and finish imitate_ chammy .
sentences.chinese: 找到一種緯彈仿麂皮絨的染整加工方法。

sentences.english: The research of this paper is of great help for the development of new products…
sentences.chinese: 這一研究結果將有助於仿色織新產品的開發。

sentences.english: Flat cable for travel running, slipping trolley imitated from import model.
sentences.chinese: 走線用扁平電纜，仿進口滑線小車等。

definition: pseudo-classical/modeled on antique/in the old style
white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
